metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2006 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's RxRPC network protocol, within the processing of RxRPC bundles. This issue results from the lack of proper locking when performing operations on an object. This may allow an attacker to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of the kernel.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74
linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-67.74
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-generic-64k - 5.15.0-67.74
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1031-aws - 5.15.0-1031.35
No subscription required
